cleanup_intermediate_files.help_text: whether to delete intermediate files from the multiple iterations of SPAdes assembly as generated within Unicycler process

mode.help_text: defines value for Unicycler option --mode and thus the aggressivity of the assembly scaffold resolution task; valid values are: 'conservative', 'normal' or 'bold'

lock_phred.help_text: sets SPAdes option --phred-offset to 33 (useful when reads quality information is missing e.g. when using SRAlite fastq reads)

careful.help_text: enables SPAdes option --careful (sets careful running mode); this parameter is exclusive of --isolate)

isolate.help_text: enables SPAdes option --isolate (sets isolate running mode); this parameter is exclusive of --careful)

monochrome_logs.help_text: Should logs appear in plain ASCII (optional)
